channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Larry Summers takes leave from teaching at Harvard after release of Epstein emails
item.description: Former U.S. Treasury Secretary Larry Summers has abruptly gone on leave from teaching at Harvard University over recently released emails showing he maintained a friendly relationship with Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Arrests now top 250 in immigration crackdown across North Carolina
Federal terrorism charge filed against a man who allegedly set a woman on fire on Chicago train
